featured.title: miniRT
featured.description: A mini raytracer built from scratch in C. Renders realistic 3D scenes with lights, shadows, and reflection.

featured.title: FdF
featured.description: A wireframe terrain renderer in isometric projection. Parses maps and draws them with depth.

hackathons.title: Rackaton
hackathons.description: A prediction tool that assesses the risk of breast cancer recurrence based on given health indicators.

hackathons.title: GreenHack
hackathons.description: A web application that calculates and visualises paths for optimal route for building power grids.

other.title: Minishell
other.description: That's my own shell. Handles pipes, redirections, built-ins, signals and environment variables.

other.title: Philosophers
other.description: A simulation based on the Dining Philosophers problem aimed on multithreaded programming.

other.title: Push_swap
other.description: A sorting algorithm implemented with limited custom operations. Focuses on computing complexity.
